random(int, int) - Method in class ai.Evaluator
Returns a random int value between a given min and max value.
RandomEvaluator - Class in ai
Does not implement a specific evaluation algorithm.
RandomEvaluator(Strategy) - Constructor for class ai.RandomEvaluator
Initiates an evaluator with random evaluation.
relocateToken(Position, GameColor) - Method in class gameelements.GameSituation
Adds a token of the given color in a given field.
remoteGameExceptionDialog() - Method in class gui.MainFrame
Calls an alert window that displays a 'remote server error'-message.
RemoteGameSynchronisationException - Exception in network
Exception thrown if synchroniszation between a local and a remote game is not successful.
RemoteGameSynchronisationException(String) - Constructor for exception network.RemoteGameSynchronisationException
Initiates a remote game synchroniszation exception.
RemotePlayer - Class in player
A player that represents the remote server, therefore utilizing a local client that connects the local game with the remote server.
RemotePlayer(String, Game, GameColor) - Constructor for class player.RemotePlayer
Initiates a remote player.
RemoteServerPanel - Class in gui
Panel for setting remote server options.
RemoteServerPanel() - Constructor for class gui.RemoteServerPanel
Creates a panel for setting the remote server options.
remove() - Method in class animation.AnimationStateQueue
Removes the next state from the queue and returns it.
removeNotify() - Method in class gui.GamePanel
This stops the panel's thread just after the panel has been removed from the main frame.
removeToken(Position) - Method in class gameelements.GameSituation
Removes a token from a field.
requestInit(GameSituation, boolean, String) - Method in class network.Client
Requests an init from the remote server.
requestMove() - Method in class ai.Strategy
Returns the next move of the player.
requestMove() - Method in class network.Client
Requests a move from the remote server.
respondWithBye(boolean) - Method in class network.Service
Creates a 'bye'-response on the console.
respondWithError(Exception) - Method in class network.Service
Creates an error message on the console.
respondWithMove(Position) - Method in class network.Service
Creates a 'move'-command on the console.
RuleBasedEvaluator - Class in ai
Provides a quick and basic algorithm for evaluating positions.
RuleBasedEvaluator(Strategy) - Constructor for class ai.RuleBasedEvaluator
Inititates a rule-based evaluator.
run() - Method in class gameelements.Game
Calls all necessary actions for each turn until the game is either stopped or won by one player.
run() - Method in class gui.GamePanel
Ensures that the panel will always receive the most recent state from the model and triggers a repaint of the panel according to the selected animation speed.
run() - Method in class network.Server
While the server is running, it will accept requests from remote clients and allocate service threads to each request.
run() - Method in class network.Service
Reads out the users requests on console and interprets them.
